name: Danger Zone (itch) (speediplayz)
description:
Short game submission for Brackeys 2021.1 Gamejam, Theme was "Stronger Together". This game is about escorting a truck through a field filled with apes. Armed with a gun, your job is to shoot the wild apes attacking you and your escort. The closer you are to the escort, the more damage your bullets deal.

-- Controls --

WASD - Control

R - Reload

L-Click - Shoot
